website_summaries.verdict: Has everything you need in cabinet knobs: looks, value, and design backed by the manufacturer. The best on the market.
pros: A sleek, attractive look for any cabinet style
Contemporary square design with rounded edges
Available in satin nickel and oil-rubbed bronze in a 25-pack
Backed by a limited lifetime warranty
cons: Some knobs may have issues with threads

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are beautiful! I had them installed in a brand new rental property we purchased that has white shaker cabinets. The kitchen looks so much better now! These knobs look for feel high end. I love that they’re square and not your typical round knobs that you see everywhere. They look great with the stainless steel appliances. Check out the before and after photos. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: PhxVegas

customer_reviews.title: It's slightly rounded and reflects light.
customer_reviews.text: This knob has a slightly, raised face, which reflects light. This reflection makes some of the knob shine, like chrome. The sheen is different than my Franklin Brass handles. Although, I found this knob to be very functional and of high quality, I decided to return it. I will be purchasing a knob with a flatter surface, something that is less bright.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Love these knobs!
customer_reviews.text: The hardest decision after you purchase these knobs is...angled or straight. I decided on angled. I researched knobs extensively because I knew we were going to sell our house but after the granite, sink, faucet and backsplash upgrade the old oil rubbed bronze round knobs looked terrible as the last photo shows. Great price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: They look great and are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are easy to install. They lose one star because some of them are not consistently shaped compared to the others. Some corners are more rounded than others or they aren't symmetrical. Minor stuff like that, which I'm sure most people won't notice once the knob is on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Max Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Simple, classy, a bit different
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace tarnished brass (gold tone) oval knobs on 15 yr old cabinets. I discovered after I got the old ones off that there was a mark left on the wood from where they contacted the surface. Thankfully, the new ones with their slightly larger square base covered that up nicely. Easy to install and I needed 25 exactly.
customer_reviews.author: SM Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, need screws for drawers
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with these, they look like I imagined they would, they add a bit of a modern touch to the kitchen and bathroom, just enough without the overused trendy styles. Only problem is that it comes with only one size screws, they are perfect for the doors but too short for the drawers. I measured and purchased longer ones for the drawers and had no problems. They are good quality, metal not plastic, the threads had no issues at all either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow gap for fingers
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning, spec's say these are 1" tall, when they are really only 15/16" overall tall. With the pillow top shape, that leaves only 5/8" space for finger tips to open doors or drawers.. Look nice, but concerned with functionality and fingernails taking finish off the cabinet doors.
customer_reviews.author: MrFlipr

customer_reviews.title: Missing longer screws
customer_reviews.text: Pulls arrived with just short screws which cannot be used for drawer fronts that require longer screws. Each pull should have one short and one long screws enclosed. Now I either have to return the entire order or try to figure how to obtain longer screws. Of course I can get some long screws from a box store that will add to the original cost of the items.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Oz

customer_reviews.title: Buy several more than you need. The threads on ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy several more than you need. The threads on the inside of the knobs are messed up on a few.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mara

customer_reviews.title: Quality door knobs
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled my kitchen and was looking for affordable door handles that didn't look cheap. I compared these door knobs to ones in my local big box home improvement store. They look and feel exactly the same, only I payed $1.44 instead of $3.68 each. I'm very happy with the quality and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Looked very nice in my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a new laundry room. Wanted a nice clean look, but not cheap....they delivered. I was happy with them. Took seconds to install, screws fit the cabinets, and they have a sleek look. These don't look cheap and have a good weight to them. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: I amazon all the time!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Wrong Length Screw
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are great quality and I really like the design. However, the screws included were not the appropriate length to work with my cabinets. The person at Lowes said that this happens frequently and they have them available for less than 2 bucks. I like the knobs but it was annoying to get all the old ones off to find I could install the new ones without a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice knob
customer_reviews.text: Very simple but classy design,assembled easy ,I was little concerned but finger prints but seems to be pretty resistant,I put these knock on my cabinet doors and paired with liberty Lombard drawer pulls and they look great and beautiful heavy knock overall good product worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: Down For The Count
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet/drawer knobs received were satisfactory. The box, which was supposed to contain 25 knobs, only contained 20. That was unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Tomsick

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: We updated our kitchen and decided to give the knobs an update without spending a lot of money. I was a bit hesitant, read the reviews and decided to give this a try. They did not disappoint! Beautiful finish and just the right size. purchased the 25 pack. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Nice and sturdy. The provided screws were too short for installation on our cabinets, however. Also make note of the way the brush of the metal goes when you install them (vertical or horizontal) the light will hit them differently and make them look weird if they're not all one direction or the other (you'll have to see them in person to understand what I mean by this) Overall super gorgeous and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Installed these as cabinet pulls during a remodel. They look good and feel solidly made. The finish is attractive and there aren't any rough edges. Great value and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroo

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise different from pictures on website.
customer_reviews.text: The knobs on the pictures look stainless steel, light tone. The knobs I received are dark gray. Compare the picture I have sent with the ones on Amazon website. So disappointed. Requested return.
customer_reviews.author: SCUBA Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great update for my cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I had boring round white plastic knobs, but when I put up the back-splash with square tiles, I wanted to upgrade to bronze square knobs. I think they look great! Only drawback was having to go to the store to buy longer screws for the knobs on drawers. I needed 49 knobs & was glad that I was able to purchase 2 sets of 25 knobs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had the 13" long cabinet pulls on my upper and lower cabinets; but I switched out the ones on my upper cabinets, for these, and it was the perfect mix! Having the longer ones all over looked too busy for me.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice knobs, solid, heavy and they look great on our kitchen and laundry room cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Blick

customer_reviews.title: Transform your doors
customer_reviews.text: They are very clean looking and quite trendy!! They are 1/10th the price on amazon than in hardware stores. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hardware Update
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful upgrade to my dresser. Heavy weight. Quick Shipping. Loved the fact that It was a 25-pack because that’s exactly how many I needed.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Created a finished and polished look. Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: Love these heavy knobs. Really upgrades the kitchen with a polished and finished look. Good weight to them. Glad I bought them. Would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bounce

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the weight. My only holdback on giving it 5 stars was that some were scuffed or scratched. I think they rub against one another and the screws in the box they came in which causes the flaws. But I put those ones on the lower cabinets where the light didn't shine as bright. Other than that it's good quality and you can't beat the price. Perfect for the look I wanted in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: brcasee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful but is not oil rubbed as mentioned. It is black and didn't go with the pulls that we had ordered and so had to return it and settle for another one
customer_reviews.author: Abhijeet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Look amazing in the kitchen! So happy! Very heavy and great looking! Built very well! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, nice heavyweight
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my cabinets. These are nice heavyweight very sturdy and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rml

customer_reviews.title: Love them, and the packing was great!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how nice they were. I was afraid I was going to find that they were cheaply made and scratched. They were well packaged, no scratches. Just what I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, sturdy and really add the extra special look to my kitchen cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. LT

customer_reviews.title: Franklin brass
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish and easy to install comes with all the hardware... had to get longer screws for thicker panel drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Rharrack

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking knobs. They look great in my bathroom; just what it needed.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking brushed nickel cabinet knob. Great value and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A much nicer product for the same price as plainer knobs in the big box home improvement stores. I've gotten many compliments. Gave my kitchen an instant update.
customer_reviews.author: Jarsheart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered both these and the drawer pulls on a Thursday and they were delivered on Saturday. Easy install, no problems and they are heavy and beautiful. Best price around. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: myracle777Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great update to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: love how this updated our kitchen from shiny round silver to this one!
customer_reviews.author: skr

customer_reviews.title: Love the drawer knobs, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: My "25-Pack" only contained 23 knobs. Disappointing, to say the least. If the company sends me 2 more knobs, they will get a 5 star rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen “jewelry”
customer_reviews.text: Brand new cabinets called for multiple packages to complete installation. Look great, nice finish. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: PelicanPower

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth finish. Seam to be heavy and good quality. Great buy for the money. This item does not have the copper highlights many oil rubbed bronze hardware items have. Keep this in mind if you are trying to match other pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia N

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality and very sturdy... the screws that came with it were not long enough thats my only complaint but it seems alot of people in here had that issue..
customer_reviews.author: Yaya G.

customer_reviews.title: Being square...it’s kinda hard to get them on straight and keep them straight.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and affordable. I have 49 knobs in my kitchen. Replaced them all with these and they look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sillygirl

customer_reviews.title: They move if you don’t put a washer thing at the back my husband had to do it.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that I had to put something on the back because they were too big and would be moving.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbet

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.. easy install
customer_reviews.text: There was a few screws missing but I got Amazon customer service to resolve it.. looks great, feels sturdy and all metal.. Not cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: 808surfer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Worked great for my second dresser. Matches my others perfectly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Atxgirl04

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! They look so great in my new white kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: CowboyLuver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived yesterday and are a beautiful addition to my bathroom cabinetry. They look exactly as pictured and are great quality (texture, color and weight).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and finish...exactly what we expected. Look great...simple but dressy! Need little work cleaning off. Very pleased and the price is great compared to the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! I loved them so much I reordered them and used them in my kitchen. They arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene F.

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely. Received 23 of the 25, but Amazon made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Creolegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product, as advertised and good seller. easy transaction. I recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Kim Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, feel and weight of these pulls. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: S.B. Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace old gold handles. I repainted my cabinets and added these new handles. They are sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, contemporary knobs!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful satin finish. Added a great contemporary look to our cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on very good looking Pulls
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on very good looking Pulls. Only issue is I now need to order more for cabinets I didn't plan on updating because these look so good.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Loving the looks!
customer_reviews.text: I love have they look! Not sure have they will hold up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ave

customer_reviews.title: Screw to short
customer_reviews.text: The knobs were great but the screws that go in them were too short and had to buy extra's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to the cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but I was shorted one knob. I received the screw but not the 25th knob. I've got to send my husband up to Lowe's and try to match it up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy tucker

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This door knobs gave my kitchen cabinets a great look for a small cost
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Quiles

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice and heavy, looks great on cabinets. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: -vg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Very heavy and worth every penny spent! Came with hardware to install and was just want I needed to finish my home remodel!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Bloebaum

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, except for missing long screws needed for drawers.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with longer break-off screws, like many other knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect is looking for square
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; square is harder to keep straight on the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: COLOR LOOKS DIFFERENT
customer_reviews.text: The website picture looks different with the actual items, holding too long passed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Distinguished
customer_reviews.text: This gave my kitchen a great look, along with the Franklin handles.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherEvaluator

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are great! Sleek, sturdy, good quality. I am very happy with my purchase. Give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lesslie Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We used them for our kitchen cabinets and they look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! A quick, easy, affordable facelift for our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update accomplished!
customer_reviews.text: These were an easy and economical update for our 90’s kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice knobs
customer_reviews.text: They fit my cabinets and are exactly what I was looking for to upgrade my look.
customer_reviews.author: margaret cage

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this , they look amazing in my kitchen cabinets .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice knobs, but they do not send the proper bolts to install.
customer_reviews.text: I like these knobs very well. They are sturdy and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Classic Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Loved the hardware. The elegant square looks beautiful on our cherry wood cabinets. Easy to install and had the full number of knobs in the box that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. McDay

customer_reviews.title: Added these to all of the cabinet doors in kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Added these to all of the cabinet doors in kitchen and bathrooms. Very warm and sharp looking. Everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Kent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once they sent the screws with the knobs worked grea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality for the price . will be installi g in new cabinets soon
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: I like them but it was listed as a 20 pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like them but it was listed as a 20 pack and I only got 19!?!?! Why!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love these knobs
customer_reviews.text: Love these knobs. I am very happy with the look as well as price. They look good and seem pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Milne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They look so good in my re done kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Lele2631

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knob
customer_reviews.text: We changed out our kitchen knobs. These were perfect for the cabinets. My drawers are apparently thicker than average so the screw provided didn't reach through however I was able to get longer ones at Home Depot. Overall quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knobs and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knobs and well constructed. Easy to install with a template. Wife commented that she did could not believe the difference these knobs make in the appearance of our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Kuehn

product_meta.title: Franklin Brass P35596K-SN-B1 1-1/5" (30mm) Classic Square Cabinet Knob, 25 Piece, Satin Nickel, 25 Piece
product_meta.description: Size:25 Piece| Color:Satin NickelFor over 75 years, Franklin Brass has set out to provide fashionable yet affordable home décor items. Our collection of cabinet provides the ultimate finishing touch without sacrificing quality or style. Complete your look with our coordinating hooks and switch plates.
feature_bullets: Brushed Nickel finish is the ideal complement to white or wood stained cabinetry
The square design offers a modern update to both contemporary and casual homes
Each item is individually packaged to protect the finish
Standard installation hardware is included.Projection:0.98 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars352 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
